column3: Includes a $17 charge to selling, general and administrative for contributions to an initiative reforming alcohol beverage laws in Washington State.
Includes a $62 tax benefit recorded in the second quarter in connection with the special cash dividend paid to employees through the Company's 401(k) Retirement Plan.
Includes a $24 charge relating to the settlement of an income tax audit in Mexico.
Includes the special cash dividend of $7.00 per share paid in December 2012.
On May 9, 2012, subsequent to the end of the third quarter of 2012, the Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.275 per share.
The quarterly dividend rate was $0.275 per share.

column2: Consolidated Statements Of Income (USD $) In Millions, except Share data in Thousands, unless otherwise specified
Consolidated Statements Of Income (USD $) In Millions, except Share data in Thousands, unless otherwise specified
Net income attributable to noncontrolling interests
NET INCOME PER COMMON SHARE ATTRIBUTABLE TO COSTCO:
CASH DIVIDENDS DECLARED PER COMMON SHARE

[1]  Includes a $17 charge to selling, general and administrative for contributions to an initiative reforming alcohol beverage laws in Washington State.  [2]  Includes a $62 tax benefit recorded in the second quarter in connection with the special cash dividend paid to employees through the Company's 401(k) Retirement Plan.  [3]  Includes a $24 charge relating to the settlement of an income tax audit in Mexico.  [4]  Includes the special cash dividend of $7.00 per share paid in December 2012.  [5]  On May 9, 2012, subsequent to the end of the third quarter of 2012, the Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.275 per share.  [6]  The quarterly dividend rate was $0.275 per share.
